title: # 388 - Jason Biggs & ME
description:
Today I sit down with American Pie star Jason Biggs. We talk about bad auditions, getting American Pie, what it was like to become famous, his first big purchases, and much more! 

Check out Jasons new show “Outmatched” on Fox! 

This episode is brought to you by Kamikoto Knives. Get 25% off site wide at www.Kamikoto.com/Bertcast and use the offer code BERTCAST at checkout. 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop.Get 15% off your membership at www.whoop.com by using the promo code "BERT" at checkout

This episode is also brought to you by Blue Apron. Get $60 off at www.blueapron.com/Bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free at www.GetQuip.com/Bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by CB Distillery. Get 20% off when you enter "Bertcast" at checkout at www.CBDistillery.com 

The Berty Boy Tour is on sale now! Get your tickets at www.bertbertbert.com  

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com  

Twitter: www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer   

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer  

Instagram: www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer 

Youtube: www.Youtube.com/user/Akreischer
